snippet.title: Gadgeteer - Pre-Alpha Trailer
snippet.description:
Update: Gadgeteer now has a Steam page. Add it to your wishlist here:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/746560/Gadgeteer/

—

Gadgeteer is a VR puzzle game where you build chain reaction machines to solve fun, intricate puzzles. Your machines will use gadgets and objects to launch, bump, twist, and turn—creating crazy chain reactions that may even end up tearing apart the fabric of space-time. 

Available for: HTC Vive
Full version release date: Early 2019

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Help us make Gadgeteer a game you'll enjoy by telling us what you think of it in the comments.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Where to find us:

Website: http://metanautvr.com/

Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/gadgeteergame/

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/metanaut/

Twitter: https://twitter.com/metanautvr

Sign up for our newsletter to get dev updates and pre-release promos: http://eepurl.com/cAQOoD

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Don't forget to subscribe to this channel

Music produced by: http://jeremylimmusic.com/
